channel.title: Armscape 562 v2
channel.description:
[u][b]First off my v1 release is located here:[/b][/u] http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,520218.0.html
Since v1 went so great, I'm going to bring up a v2. My main goal in the project is to bring back the 562s(original 562 loading 562) from the dead.
[b]Onto my server development:[/b]
Combat is actually fairly well coded already so Basically I'm working on skills. [center][img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043034/runescape/images/7/77/Fletching-icon.png[/img][u][b]Fletching:[/b][/u][img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305043034/runescape/images/7/77/Fletching-icon.png[/img][/center] my ex.players used to claim that fletching would take maximum of 5min to get a 99, so mainly I'm going to lower the exp rates. -Add the correct fletching items and not some shitty spinning wheel.
[center][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305015160/runescape/images/f/f0/Farming-icon.png[/img][u][b]Farming:[/b][/u][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305015160/runescape/images/f/f0/Farming-icon.png[/img][/center] -Make a shop that sells farming seeds and not the painzone method of killing shit.
[center][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042731/runescape/images/e/e3/Summoning-icon.png[/img][u][b]Summoning:[/b][/u][img]http://images3.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042731/runescape/images/e/e3/Summoning-icon.png[/img][/center] - Add summoning scrolls (the effects might not work but the items will be generated for summoning exp) - Dismissible summoning familiars without using my dismiss command. - Possibility of them attacking other people/monsters (if they can't do that already) [center] [img]http://www.rightent.com/images/software_update_icon.jpg[/img][u][b]Big updates that will be added:[/b][/u][img]http://www.rightent.com/images/software_update_icon.jpg[/img][/center] - A try to make the makeover mage - Better pvp drops and chaos elemental not dropping glitchy drops
[img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/CrystalClear/48x48/actions/agt_update_misc.png[/img][u][b]Update log:[/b][/u][img]http://cdn1.iconfinder.com/data/icons/CrystalClear/48x48/actions/agt_update_misc.png[/img] -Started working on armscape again after 3 or 4 months of offline time. - fixed the drops of the bandos avatar.
[center][img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042927/runescape/images/c/cf/Slayer-icon.png[/img][u][b]Slayer:[/b][/u][img]http://images4.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20110305042927/runescape/images/c/cf/Slayer-icon.png[/img][/center] -Fix the npc dialogue -Change slayer monsters assigned to lower levels to something actually more usual (I accidentally made it so that a level 3 could have a bronze dragon slayer task) - Newer default look [u][b]Further updates will be added soon.[/b][/u] Massive update with slayer ^
[u][b]Armscape is a gay name you find? Should I rename it? If so pick one from the list below:[/b][/u] -Omega -DerbyScape - Project 09

So I’d Change the option project 08 to project 09[/quote]

item.title: Armscape 562 v2
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

First off my v1 release is located here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,520218.0.html

Since v1 went so great, I’m going to bring up a v2. My main goal in the project is to bring back the 562s(original 562 loading 562) from the dead.

Onto my server development:

Combat is actually fairly well coded already so Basically I’m working on skills.
[center]Fletching:[/center]
my ex.players used to claim that fletching would take maximum of 5min to get a 99, so mainly I’m going to lower the exp rates.
-Add the correct fletching items and not some shitty spinning wheel.

[center]Farming:[/center]
-Make a shop that sells farming seeds and not the painzone method of killing shit.

[center]Summoning:[/center]

  • Add summoning scrolls (the effects might not work but the items will be generated for summoning exp)
  • Dismissible summoning familiars without using my dismiss command.
  • Possibility of them attacking other people/monsters (if they can’t do that already)
    [center]
    Big updates that will be added:[/center]
  • A try to make the makeover mage
  • Better pvp drops and chaos elemental not dropping glitchy drops

Update log:
-Started working on armscape again after 3 or 4 months of offline time.

  • fixed the drops of the bandos avatar.

[center]Slayer:[/center]
-Fix the npc dialogue
-Change slayer monsters assigned to lower levels to something actually more usual (I accidentally made it so that a level 3 could have a bronze dragon slayer task)

  • Newer default look
    Further updates will be added soon.
    Massive update with slayer ^

Armscape is a gay name you find? Should I rename it? If so pick one from the list below:
-Omega
-DerbyScape

  • Project 09

Read full topic
